name: Blood Runs...
description:
A week 3 game prototype for GDS230. Based on the horror film "American Werewolf in London" where the player finds themselves running from their werewolf friend during a full moon. Run, run while your can before it's too late..

CONTROLS:

WASD - MOVEMENT

SHIFT TO RUN

Map: Low Poly City Set by BitGem

Main BGM: Warwick, the Uncaged Wrath of Zaun | Login Screen - League of Legends
Original: https://youtu.be/RGssFVA3auQ

Ambience BGM: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ta7PPkwLZs
